/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The street is flanked by trees and shrubs, adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. Cars of various colors are scattered along the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene.
